reference.shortdesc: Prerequisites are things that users must know or tasks that users must perform before starting the current task.

section.title: Formatting expectations
section.p: Implementations MAY render prerequisite links from the related-links section together with the prereq content.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The prereq element is specialized from the section element in the topic module.

example.title: Example
example.codeblock: <task id="sqlj"> <title>Creating an SQLJ file</title> <taskbody> <prereq>Before creating a new SQLJ file, you must log in to the SQLJ server.</prereq> </taskbody> </task>
